channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:152) at client.method6(client.java:6949) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4399) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
i get this error how do i solve it
btw i got ths error after i added all new magic icons with toms cache suite
